      function getRaceNameList() {
        return _map(global.race, (i) => {
          if(!_isNil(_get(i, 'subrace'))) {
            return {
              name: _get(i, 'name'),
              items: _map(_get(i, 'subrace'), 'name')
            }
          }else {
            return _get(i, 'name');
          }
        })
      }
      function getRaceDetail(name) {
        let res = _find(global.race, ['name', name]);
        if(_isNil(res)) {
          _forEach(global.race, (race) => {
            /* 此处必定有子种族 */
            const d = _find(race.subrace, ['name', name]);
            if(!_isNil(d)) {
              res = _assign({}, race, {subrace: undefined}, d, {
                traits: _concat(race.traits, d.traits)
              });
              return false;
            }
          })
        }
        return res;
      }

      setGlobal('getRaceNameList', getRaceNameList);
      setGlobal('getRaceDetail', getRaceDetail);
